page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN OTLEY
page.content: There are 163 jobs available in and around Otley and Ilkley also Yeadon and Burley. The average man brings home mostly over 70 pounds a week. 23 of the available jobs are in Otley. Every two days 163 people come into the job centre; about 90 - 100 people may go into the job centre a day. There are more people in the job centre on a Monday because it is signing on day so the unemployed come in to see what jobs are on offer. The jobs in the area are sent to the job centre so that people who have no job can see most of the jobs which are vacant. Cards are typed out with the details, and people read them when they are fixed to the display boards.
